description: Mobile app TikTok vertical video shot grammar. Focuses on UI demonstrations and feature showcases. Shows screen content directly without device frames by default.

ui_hero.description: Full-screen showcase of the app's main interface or key feature
ui_hero.llm_instruction: Show the app's main screen or hero feature in full-screen composition. The UI should be clean, modern, and clearly readable. Use subtle motion to draw attention to key elements. Duration: 4-8 seconds.

problem_hook.description: Visual representation of the problem the app solves
problem_hook.llm_instruction: Create a visual hook showing the problem or frustration the app solves. Could be cluttered interfaces, manual processes, or inefficient workflows. Creates urgency for the solution. Duration: 3-6 seconds.

feature_demo.description: Showcasing a specific app feature with interaction indicators
feature_demo.llm_instruction: Demonstrate a specific app feature with clear interaction cues (tap indicators, swipe trails). Show the action and its result. The interaction should feel natural and intuitive. Duration: 5-10 seconds.

ui_transition.description: Smooth transition between app screens showing navigation
ui_transition.llm_instruction: Show smooth navigation between 2-3 app screens. Transitions should feel native to mobile platforms (push, modal, tab switches). Demonstrates app depth and user journey. Duration: 4-7 seconds.

feature_highlight.description: Zoomed focus on a specific UI element with annotation
feature_highlight.llm_instruction: Zoom into a specific UI element (button, metric, feature) with a subtle visual callout. Helps viewers understand key functionality. Keep text overlays minimal. Duration: 3-6 seconds.

before_after.description: Side-by-side or sequential comparison showing app value
before_after.llm_instruction: Show before/after or problem/solution comparison. Can be split-screen or sequential. Clearly demonstrates the app's value proposition. Duration: 5-8 seconds.

social_proof.description: Ratings, reviews, download counts, or testimonials
social_proof.llm_instruction: Display social proof elements: app store ratings, review quotes, download numbers. Use clean typography on simple background. Builds trust. Duration: 3-5 seconds.

lifestyle_context.description: App being used in real-life scenario (hands optional)
lifestyle_context.llm_instruction: ONLY use if creative brief emphasizes real-world usage. Show app screen content within a lifestyle context (hands holding phone, desk scene). Subtle depth of field. Duration: 4-7 seconds.

download_cta.description: Final screen with app name, tagline, and download prompt
download_cta.llm_instruction: Final CTA screen with app icon/logo, app name, and clear download call-to-action. Clean, professional composition. May include 'Download Free' or 'Try Now' messaging. Duration: 4-6 seconds.

scene_flow_rules.first_scene_explanation: Start with either the hero UI to hook visually, or a problem statement to create urgency
scene_flow_rules.last_scene_explanation: Always end with clear download call-to-action
scene_flow_rules.max_consecutive_explanation: Avoid using the same shot type more than twice in a row

screen_visibility_rules.explanation: App UI must be visible in majority of scenes

text_overlay_rules.max_text_blocks_explanation: Keep text minimal to not compete with UI

tech_clean.name: Tech Clean
tech_clean.description: Minimalist white/light backgrounds with floating UI
tech_clean.color_palette: White, light grays, accent colors from app

dark_mode.name: Dark Mode
dark_mode.description: Dark backgrounds optimized for OLED, subtle glows

must_include: At least one UI screen showing app interface
Clear, readable UI (no blur or distortion)

scenes.prompt: Frustrated person looking at cluttered, overwhelming task list interface
Clean, modern task management app dashboard with organized cards
Finger tapping to create new task, smooth animation as task card appears
Zoom to calendar integration feature, subtle glow highlighting sync icon
App icon centered on gradient background with app name and Download Free button

llm_prompt_template:
You are a mobile app marketing video director. Create a TikTok vertical video scene plan (9:16) constrained by mobile app shot grammar.

REQUIREMENTS:
1. Use ONLY these shot types: ui_hero, problem_hook, feature_demo, ui_transition, feature_highlight, before_after, social_proof (optional), lifestyle_context (optional), download_cta
2. First scene MUST be: ui_hero OR problem_hook
3. Last scene MUST be: download_cta
4. Total scenes: {scene_count}
5. Each scene: 3-10 seconds duration
6. App UI visible in majority of scenes
7. NO device frames unless explicitly requested
8. All UI must be sharp and readable

Generate concise, compelling scene descriptions that showcase the app's value. Output valid JSON.
